original_text: So Moses went out to meet his father-in-law and bowed down and kissed him. They greeted each other and then went into the tent.
korean_text: 모세가 나가서 그의 장인을 맞아 절하고 그에게 입 맞추고 그들이 서로 문안하고 함께 장막에 들어가서

sentences.original_text: So Moses went out to meet his father-in-law
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세는 그의 장인을 만나러 나아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and bowed down and kissed him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 절하고 그에게 입을 맞추었습니다

sentences.original_text: and then went into the tent
